verses.t: There{G1161} were present{G3918} at{G1722} that{G846} season{G3588} some{G5100} that told{G518} him{G846} of{G4012} the Galilæans{G3588}, whose{G3739} blood{G3588} Pilate{G4091} had mingled{G3396} with{G3326} their{G846} sacrifices{G3588}.

And{G2532} Jesus{G3588} answering{G611} said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Suppose ye{G1380} that{G3754} these{G3778} Galilæans{G3588} were{G1096} sinners{G268} above{G3844} all{G3956} the Galilæans{G3588}, because{G3754} they suffered{G3958} such things{G5108}?
I tell{G3004} you{G5213}, Nay{G3780}: but{G235}, except{G1437} ye repent{G3340}, ye shall{G622} all{G3956} likewise{G5615} perish{G622}.

Or{G2228} those{G1565} eighteen{G1176}, upon{G1722} whom{G3739} the tower{G3588} in{G1909} Siloam{G4611} fell{G4098}, and{G2532} slew{G615} them{G846}, think ye{G1380} that{G3754} they{G3778} were{G1096} sinners{G3781} above{G3844} all{G3956} men{G444} that dwelt{G2730} in{G1722} Jerusalem{G2419}?
I tell{G3004} you{G5213}, Nay{G3780}: but{G235}, except{G1437} ye repent{G3340}, ye shall{G622} all{G3956} likewise{G3668} perish{G622}.

He spake{G3004} also{G1161} this{G3778} parable{G3588}; A certain{G5100} man had{G2192} a fig tree{G4808} planted{G5452} in{G1722} his{G846} vineyard{G3588}; and{G2532} he came{G2064} and sought{G2212} fruit{G2590} thereon{G846}, and{G2532} found{G2147} none{G3756}.

Then{G1161} said he{G2036} unto{G4314} the dresser of his vineyard{G289}, Behold{G2400}, these three{G5140} years{G2094} I come{G2064} seeking{G2212} fruit{G2590} on{G1722} this{G3778} fig tree{G3588}, and{G2532} find{G2147} none{G3756}: cut{G1581} it{G846} down{G1581}; why{G2444} cumbereth{G2673} it{G3588} the ground{G1093}?

And{G1161} he answering{G611} said{G3004} unto him{G846}, Lord{G2962}, let{G863} it{G846} alone{G863} this{G5124} year{G3588} also{G2532}, till{G2193} I shall dig{G4626}about{G4012} it{G846}, and{G2532} dung{G2874} it:
And if{G2579} it bear{G4160} fruit{G2590}, well: and{G1161} if{G1487} not{G3361}, then after that{G3195} thou shalt cut{G1581} it{G846} down{G1581}.
And{G1161} he was{G2258} teaching{G1321} in{G1722} one{G1520} of the synagogues{G3588} on{G1722} the sabbath{G3588}.

And{G2532}, behold{G2400}, there was{G2258} a woman{G1135} which had{G2192} a spirit{G4151} of infirmity{G769} eighteen{G1176} years{G2094}, and{G2532} was{G2258} bowed together{G4794}, and{G2532} could{G1410} in{G1519} no{G3361} wise{G3838} lift up{G352} herself.
And{G1161} when Jesus{G3588} saw{G1492} her{G846}, he called{G4377} her to him, and{G2532} said{G2036} unto her{G846}, Woman{G1135}, thou art loosed{G630} from thine{G4675} infirmity{G3588}.
And{G2532} he laid{G2007} his hands{G3588} on her{G846}: and{G2532} immediately{G3916} she was made straight{G461}, and{G2532} glorified{G1392} God{G3588}.

And{G1161} the ruler of the synagogue{G3588} answered{G611} with indignation{G23}, because{G3754} that Jesus{G3588} had healed{G2323} on the sabbath day{G3588}, and said{G3004} unto the people{G3588}, There are{G1526} six{G1803} days{G2250} in{G1722} which men{G3739} ought{G1163} to work{G2038}: in{G1722} them{G3778} therefore{G3767} come{G2064} and be healed{G2323}, and{G2532} not{G3361} on the sabbath{G3588} day{G3588}.

The Lord{G3588} then{G3767} answered{G611} him{G846}, and{G2532} said{G2036}, Thou hypocrite{G5273}, doth{G3089} not{G3756} each one{G1538} of you{G5216} on the sabbath{G3588} loose{G3089} his{G846} ox{G3588} or{G2228} his ass{G3588} from{G575} the stall{G3588}, and{G2532} lead{G520} him away{G520} to watering{G4222}?

And{G1161} ought{G1163} not{G3756} this woman{G3778}, being{G5607} a daughter{G2364} of Abraham{G11}, whom{G3739} Satan{G3588} hath bound{G1210}, lo{G2400}, these eighteen{G1176} years{G2094}, be loosed{G3089} from{G575} this{G5127} bond{G3588} on the sabbath{G3588} day{G3588}?

And{G2532} when he{G846} had said{G3004} these things{G5023}, all{G3956} his{G846} adversaries{G480} were ashamed{G2617}: and{G2532} all{G3956} the people{G3588} rejoiced{G5463} for{G1909} all{G3956} the glorious{G1741} things that{G3588} were done{G1096} by{G5259} him{G846}.
Then{G1161} said he{G3004}, Unto what{G5101} is{G2076} the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588} like{G3664}? and{G2532} whereunto{G5101} shall I resemble{G3666} it{G846}?

It is{G2076} like{G3664} a grain{G2848} of mustard seed{G4615}, which{G3739} a man{G444} took{G2983}, and cast{G906} into{G1519} his{G1438} garden{G2779}; and{G2532} it grew{G837}, and{G2532} waxed{G1096} a great{G3173} tree{G1186}; and{G2532} the fowls{G3588} of the air{G3588} lodged{G2681} in{G1722} the branches{G3588} of it{G846}.
And{G2532} again{G3825}he said{G2036}, Whereunto{G5101} shall I liken{G3666} the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588}?
It is{G2076} like{G3664} leaven{G2219}, which{G3739} a woman{G1135} took{G2983} and hid{G1470} in{G1519} three{G5140} measures{G4568} of meal{G224}, till{G2193} the whole{G3650} was leavened{G2220}.
And{G2532} he went{G1279} through{G2596} the cities{G4172} and{G2532} villages{G2968}, teaching{G1321}, and{G2532} journeying{G4197} toward{G1519} Jerusalem{G2419}.
Then{G1161} said{G2036} one{G5100} unto him{G846}, Lord{G2962}, are there{G1487} few{G3641} that{G3588} be saved{G4982}? And{G1161} he said{G2036} unto{G4314} them{G846},

Strive{G75} to enter in{G1525} at{G1223} the strait{G4728} gate{G4439}: for{G3754} many{G4183}, I say{G3004} unto you{G5213}, will seek{G2212} to enter in{G1525}, and{G2532} shall{G2480} not{G3756} be able{G2480}.

When{G575} once{G3739} the master of the house{G3588} is risen up{G1453}, and{G2532} hath shut to{G608} the door{G3588}, and{G2532} ye begin{G756} to stand{G2476} without{G1854}, and{G2532} to knock{G2925} at the door{G3588}, saying{G3004}, Lord{G2962}, Lord{G2962}, open{G455} unto us{G2254}; and{G2532} he shall answer{G611} and say{G2046} unto you{G5213}, I know{G1492} you{G5209} not{G3756} whence{G4159} ye are{G2075}:
Then{G5119} shall ye begin{G756} to say{G3004}, We have eaten{G5315} and{G2532} drunk{G4095} in thy{G4675} presence{G1799}, and{G2532} thou hast taught{G1321} in{G1722} our{G2257} streets{G3588}.

But{G2532} he shall say{G2046}, I tell{G3004} you{G5213}, I know{G1492} you{G5209} not{G3756} whence{G4159} ye are{G2075}; depart{G868} from{G575} me{G1700}, all{G3956} ye workers{G3588} of iniquity{G3588}.

There{G1563} shall be{G2071} weeping{G3588} and{G2532} gnashing{G3588} of teeth{G3588}, when{G3752} ye shall see{G3700} Abraham{G11}, and{G2532} Isaac{G2464}, and{G2532} Jacob{G2384}, and{G2532} all{G3956} the prophets{G3588}, in{G1722} the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588}, and{G1161} you{G5209} yourselves thrust{G1544} out{G1854}.

And{G2532} they shall come{G2240} from{G575} the east{G395}, and{G2532} from the west{G1424}, and{G2532} from{G575} the north{G1005}, and{G2532} from the south{G3558}, and{G2532} shall sit down{G347} in{G1722} the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588}.
And{G2532}, behold{G2400}, there are{G1526} last{G2078} which{G3739} shall be{G2071} first{G4413}, and{G2532} there are{G1526} first{G4413} which{G3739} shall be{G2071} last{G2078}.

The same{G846} day{G3588} there came{G4334} certain{G5100} of the Pharisees{G5330}, saying{G3004} unto him{G846}, Get thee out{G1831}, and{G2532} depart{G4198} hence{G1782}: for{G3754} Herod{G2264} will{G2309} kill{G615} thee{G4571}.

And{G2532} he said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Go ye{G4198}, and tell{G2036} that{G3778} fox{G3588}, Behold{G2400}, I cast out{G1544} devils{G1140}, and{G2532} I do{G2005} cures{G2392} to day{G4594} and{G2532} to morrow{G839}, and{G2532} the third{G5154}day I shall be perfected{G5048}.

Nevertheless{G4133} I{G3165} must{G1163} walk{G4198} to day{G4594}, and{G2532} to morrow{G839}, and{G2532} the{G3588} day following{G2192}: for{G3754} it{G1735} cannot{G3756} be{G1735} that a prophet{G4396} perish{G622} out of{G1854} Jerusalem{G2419}.

O Jerusalem{G2419}, Jerusalem{G2419}, which{G3588} killest{G615} the prophets{G3588}, and{G2532} stonest{G3036} them that{G3588} are sent{G649} unto{G4314} thee{G846}; how often{G4212} would{G2309} I have gathered{G1996} thy{G4675} children{G3588} together{G1996}, as{G3739} a hen{G3733} doth gather her{G1438} brood{G3555} under{G5259} her wings{G3588}, and{G2532} ye would{G2309} not{G3756}!

Behold{G2400}, your{G5216} house{G3588} is left{G863} unto you{G5213} desolate{G2048}: and{G1161} verily{G281} I say{G3004} unto you{G5213}, Ye shall{G1492} not{G3756} see{G1492} me{G3165}, until{G2193} the time come{G2240} when{G3753} ye shall say{G2036}, Blessed{G2127} is he that{G3588} cometh{G2064} in{G1722} the name{G3686} of the Lord{G2962}.
